info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 2:54PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Berkshire County through 315 PM EDT... At 254 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pittsfield, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pittsfield, Cheshire, Savoy, Berkshire, Dalton, Lanesborough, Hinsdale, Windsor, Peru, Washington, Victory Hill, Farnams, Pontoosuc, Ponterril, Lakewood, New Lenox, Lakeview Terrace, The Boulders, Coltsville and Adams Junction. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
